From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Catalan

[edit]

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central, Balearic) [sən.tən.siˈa]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [sen.ten.siˈaɾ]

Verb

[edit]

sentenciar (first-person singular present sentencio, first-person singular preterite sentencií, past participle sentenciat)

  1. (transitive, intransitive) to sentence; to condemn

Conjugation

[edit]

singular sentenciat sentenciada
plural sentenciats sentenciades

preterite sentencií sentenciares sentencià sentenciàrem sentenciàreu sentenciaren
conditional sentenciaria sentenciaries sentenciaria sentenciaríem sentenciaríeu sentenciarien

Related terms

[edit]
  • sentència

Further reading

[edit]
  • “sentenciar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin sententia, from sentire.

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /sẽ.tẽ.siˈa(ʁ)/ [sẽ.tẽ.sɪˈa(h)], (faster pronunciation) /sẽ.tẽˈsja(ʁ)/ [sẽ.tẽˈsja(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /sẽ.tẽ.siˈa(ʁ)/ [sẽ.tẽ.sɪˈa(h)], (faster pronunciation) /sẽ.tẽˈsja(ʁ)/ [sẽ.tẽˈsja(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /sẽ.tẽ.siˈa(ɾ)/ [sẽ.tẽ.sɪˈa(ɾ)], (faster pronunciation) /sẽ.tẽˈsja(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /sẽ.tẽ.siˈa(ʁ)/ [sẽ.tẽ.sɪˈa(χ)], (faster pronunciation) /sẽ.tẽˈsja(ʁ)/ [sẽ.tẽˈsja(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /sẽ.tẽ.siˈa(ɻ)/ [sẽ.tẽ.sɪˈa(ɻ)], (faster pronunciation) /sẽ.tẽˈsja(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /sẽ.tẽˈsjaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /sẽ.tẽˈsjaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /sẽ.tẽˈsja.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: sen‧ten‧ci‧ar

Verb

[edit]

sentenciar (first-person singular present sentencio, first-person singular preterite sentenciei, past participle sentenciado)

  1. to sentence

Conjugation

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From sentencia (“sentence”) +‎ -ar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /sentenˈθjaɾ/ [sẽn̪.t̪ẽn̟ˈθjaɾ] (Spain)
  • IPA(key): /sentenˈsjaɾ/ [sẽn̪.t̪ẽnˈsjaɾ] (Latin America, Philippines)
  • Audio (Colombia):(file)
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: sen‧ten‧ciar

Verb

[edit]

sentenciar (first-person singular present sentencio, first-person singular preterite sentencié, past participle sentenciado)

  1. to sentence
    Synonym: condenar
  2. to voice an opinion

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of sentenciar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)

gerund sentenciando
past participle masculine feminine
singular sentenciado sentenciada
plural sentenciados sentenciadas

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.
